INFINIDAT was founded in 2011 by a team of storage industry experts focused on helping customers to eliminate compromises between cost, capacity, functionality and performance when it comes to their storage, enabling them to focus more on what makes their organizations competitive. Our product is InfiniBox, a Flash-Optimized storage platform that outperforms All-Flash arrays in real world workloads, is extremely simple to use, and provides 99.99999% data availability.
